scenes.description: Opening video montage introducing guest VTubers and the star, Tsunomaki Watame.
Tsunomaki Watame makes her entrance on the main stage and welcomes the audience.
Tsunomaki Watame performs the song 'Wonderland and the Sheep's Song'.
scenes.song_name: ワンダーランドと羊の歌

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 3周年ライブ、遊びに来てくれてありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to my 3rd anniversary live!

subtitles.original: 楽しんでいきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's have some fun!

subtitles.original:
ワンダーランドと羊の歌
作詞・作曲 ハチ
subtitles.english:
Wonderland and the Sheep's Song
Lyrics & Composition: Hachi

subtitles.original: 何でもないような顔して犬をご機嫌損ねてバウワウと
subtitles.english: With a nonchalant face, upsetting the dog, bow-wow

subtitles.original: 今日もレイニーデイ レイニーデイ
subtitles.english: Another rainy day, rainy day

subtitles.original: 山の頂上で少女が泣き濡れてはリンゴ飴をなめて空を見た
subtitles.english: A girl crying on a mountain peak, licking a candy apple and looking at the sky

subtitles.original: 今日もレイニーデイ レイニーデイ
subtitles.english: Another rainy day, rainy day

subtitles.original: カンテラ持って飾って
subtitles.english: Holding and decorating a lantern

subtitles.original: 明日の準備を拵えて
subtitles.english: Preparing for tomorrow

subtitles.original: 賛美の言葉を唱えよ
subtitles.english: Chanting words of praise

subtitles.original: ほらハイレディランド
subtitles.english: Look, High Ready Land

subtitles.original: 魚の目で歌って
subtitles.english: Singing with the eyes of a fish

subtitles.original: 有刺鉄線を飛び越えて
subtitles.english: Jumping over the barbed wire

subtitles.original: 遊ぼうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's play

subtitles.original: 笑おうぜ
subtitles.english: Let's laugh

subtitles.original: くだらない愛を歌うこの街の中
subtitles.english: In this city where trivial love is sung

subtitles.original: 灯を灯せば何もない
subtitles.english: If you light a lamp, there's nothing there

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 4 5 ほら合図で君に会いに行く
subtitles.english: 1 2 3 4 5, look, with the signal I'll go see you

subtitles.original: 新しい日を迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go welcome a new day
(La la la...)

subtitles.original: なんて名前かも忘れてまた赤電話鳴りフワフワと
subtitles.english: Forgetting the name, the red phone rings again, floating along

subtitles.original: 今日もレイニーデイ レイニーデイ
subtitles.english: Another rainy day, rainy day

subtitles.original: 煙草の煙に濡れちゃってまたむせ返る路地裏さて歩いてった
subtitles.english: Soaked in cigarette smoke, choking in the back alley, I walked on

subtitles.original: レイニーデイ レイニーデイ
subtitles.english: Rainy day, rainy day

subtitles.original: アンテナ立ったらもう一回
subtitles.english: Once the antenna's up, one more time

subtitles.original: 商店街から顔出して
subtitles.english: Peeking out from the shopping street

subtitles.original: 泣いてる子には唱えよ
subtitles.english: Chant to the crying child

subtitles.original: ほらハイレディランド
subtitles.english: Look, High Ready Land

subtitles.original: サヨナラばかり詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Packed full of nothing but goodbyes

subtitles.original: 二律背反を背負い込んで
subtitles.english: Shouldering antinomies

subtitles.original: 泣かないで
subtitles.english: Don't cry

subtitles.original: 揺れないで
subtitles.english: Don't waver

subtitles.original: 右手の上で回る地球儀を
subtitles.english: The globe spinning on the right hand

subtitles.original: 左手の火で照らそうか
subtitles.english: Shall we light it with the fire in the left hand?

subtitles.original: 空の色が変わるその時に
subtitles.english: At that moment when the sky changes color

subtitles.original: 胸に残るのは君のこと
subtitles.english: What remains in the heart is you

subtitles.original: 雨宿り駄菓子屋で
subtitles.english: Sheltering from the rain at a candy store

subtitles.original: 神様の帰りを待った
subtitles.english: Waiting for God to return

subtitles.original: さあ歌おうか羊の歌
subtitles.english: Now, shall we sing the sheep's song?

subtitles.original: 君の手のそのカンテラが
subtitles.english: That lantern in your hand

subtitles.original: 全てを照らす太陽なんだ
subtitles.english: Is the sun that illuminates everything

subtitles.original: 君が歌を歌うこの街の中
subtitles.english: In this city where you sing a song

subtitles.original: 灯を灯せば素敵なこと
subtitles.english: If you light a lamp, it's a wonderful thing

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 4 5 ほら合図で君に会いに行く
subtitles.english: 1 2 3 4 5, look, with the signal I'll go see you

subtitles.original: 新しい日を迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go welcome a new day

subtitles.original: トンネルの先には何がある
subtitles.english: What lies at the end of the tunnel?

subtitles.original: 未知なる街の底に踏み出していく
subtitles.english: Stepping into the bottom of an unknown city

subtitles.original: 1 2 3 4 5 ほら合図で君に会いに行く
subtitles.english: 1 2 3 4 5, look, with the signal I'll go see you

subtitles.original: 新しい日を迎えに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go welcome a new day
(La la la...)
